title: "Disabled people need plastic straws"- wouldn't metal straws work?
body: In their own homes, a metal straw might be a usable option. It would depend on their disability and their exact needs. But, it would be fairly inconvenient to take a metal straw with them if they go places. It would be inconvenient for restaurants to supply them. Also, metal straws aren't flexible.
